description: The `AWS::Redshift::EventSubscription` resource creates an Amazon Redshift Event Subscription.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

SubscriptionName.description: The name of the Amazon Redshift event notification subscription
SubscriptionName.markdownDescription:
The name of the Amazon Redshift event notification subscription

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^(?=^[a-z][a-z0-9]*(-[a-z0-9]+)*$).{1,255}$  

Update requires: No interruption

SnsTopicArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon SNS topic used to transmit the event notifications.
SnsTopicArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon SNS topic used to transmit the event notifications.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

SourceType.description: The type of source that will be generating the events.
SourceType.markdownDescription:
The type of source that will be generating the events.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

SourceIds.description: A list of one or more identifiers of Amazon Redshift source objects.
SourceIds.markdownDescription:
A list of one or more identifiers of Amazon Redshift source objects.

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

EventCategories.description: Specifies the Amazon Redshift event categories to be published by the event notification subscription.
EventCategories.markdownDescription:
Specifies the Amazon Redshift event categories to be published by the event notification subscription.

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

Severity.description: Specifies the Amazon Redshift event severity to be published by the event notification subscription.
Severity.markdownDescription:
Specifies the Amazon Redshift event severity to be published by the event notification subscription.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

Enabled.description: A boolean value; set to true to activate the subscription, and set to false to create the subscription but not activate it.
Enabled.markdownDescription:
A boolean value; set to true to activate the subscription, and set to false to create the subscription but not activate it.

---

Required: No

Type: boolean     

Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

CustomerAwsId.description: The AWS account associated with the Amazon Redshift event notification subscription.
CustomerAwsId.markdownDescription:
The AWS account associated with the Amazon Redshift event notification subscription.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

CustSubscriptionId.description: The name of the Amazon Redshift event notification subscription.
CustSubscriptionId.markdownDescription:
The name of the Amazon Redshift event notification subscription.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

Status.description: The status of the Amazon Redshift event notification subscription.
Status.markdownDescription:
The status of the Amazon Redshift event notification subscription.

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

SubscriptionCreationTime.description: The date and time the Amazon Redshift event notification subscription was created.
SubscriptionCreationTime.markdownDescription:
The date and time the Amazon Redshift event notification subscription was created.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

SourceIdsList.description: A list of the sources that publish events to the Amazon Redshift event notification subscription.
SourceIdsList.markdownDescription:
A list of the sources that publish events to the Amazon Redshift event notification subscription.

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

EventCategoriesList.description: The list of Amazon Redshift event categories specified in the event notification subscription.
EventCategoriesList.markdownDescription:
